kb3.name: kb3_inv_all
kb3.structure: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `kb3_inv_all` ( `ina_kll_id` int(6) NOT NULL, `ina_all_id` int(3) NOT NULL, `ina_timestamp` datetime NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`ina_kll_id`,`ina_all_id`), KEY `ina_all_time` (`ina_all_id`,`ina_timestamp`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
